Sequence Information.Peptide Name: CCL21 (SLC, cytokine, CC family; kinocidins; antimicrobial protein; UCSS1a; 3S=S, natural AMPs; human, primates, mammals, animals)

Literature.Author: Yang D, Chen Q, Hoover DM, Staley P, Tucker KD, Lubkowski J, Oppenheim JJ.2003
Literature.Title: Many chemokines including CCL20/MIP-3alpha display antimicrobial activity

Sequence Information.Comments: Activity: At 10 ug/ml, it killed 45% E. coli and 75% S. aureus. This chemokine has dual role:cancer promotionandanticancer, both of which are under active eresearch.Structure:You can rotate, zoom, and view the 3D structureherein the PDB.
